title: Looking For Support Main
body: I am looking for a support main, i am running into to many people instalocking or just making me 1v2.

replies.body: I'm a support main. I may be level 30 but I have less than 16 champions so I can't play ranked, and I only got level 30 recently.
Im a support main  since beta mostly play thresh add me one oce: A can of soap

ima support main, sion and leo are 2 of my fav supports, i may not be the best person to take advice from cuz i have a personal dispute against using sightstone, if u wanna be a bit more aggressive some other supports i like are nami and morganna

Few good ones:
{{champion:32}} Is absolutely disgusting. 1 month after I picked up league, I tried support Amumu and went 1/2/16 and got a A+. 
{{champion:412}} and {{champion:53}} are both good for peeling, although Thresh is better for maining.
{{champion:40}} is meta right now and very good.
{{champion:16}} for making your carry invincible.
And {{champion:223}} for being a little ***** (ahhhhhh, no)
